casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CITY OF DURHAM. No. 137A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 15, 2006. Stewart W. Fisher, Carlos E. Mahoney, William S. Mills, Robert B. Glenn, Durham, for Linda Jones. Reginald B. Gillespie, Jr., O. William Faison, Durham, for City of Durham, et al. Mark A. Davis, James B. Blackburn, Raleigh, for NC Asso. of County Commissioners, et al. Bradley N. Schulz, Smithfield, Marie Mobley, for North Carolina Academy of Trial Lawyers. Andrew L. Romanet, Jr., Raleigh, for NC League of Municipalities. Debra Bechtel, County Attorney, Bill Little, Asst. City Attorney, Mark Newbold, Deputy City Attorney/Police, for NCAPA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of May 2006 by Amicus for Extension of Time to File Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Amicus (NCAPA) shall have up to and including the 26th day of May, 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of May 2006."
